types:type.name: error-response
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type error_response = {| code: String, description: String, message: String, stackTrace: String |} {"example": "{\\\"code\\\":\\\"400\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"APP:BAD-REQUEST\\\",\\\"message\\\":\\\"SAP rejected message\\\",\\\"stackTrace\\\":\\\"trace message\\\"}"}
